info.readme:
Install Instructions:- Install 51Degrees.mobi package before running the site.
Overview:- Desktop Sites are not mobile-friendly when viewed from the Mobile devices. Mobile Sites need to provide users precisely what they are looking for quickly and simply. There are four times as many mobile devices than desktop computers.
A staggering 2 billion people worldwide have a mobile device. A majority of searches are now coming from these devices. Mobile friendly sites can boost site SEO and overall user experience.
I have built a demo site that uses common CMS for Mobile and Desktop site.
Feature List:- • It allows mobile site to access from same link instead of building a separate m.url. Therefore, helping site to gain more traffic and benefit from SEO. • It uses common content but Mobile Templates can be separately created to provide optimised mobile look. • As it’s a common CMS so cost of development gets reduced.

HomeTemplate.homePageImageText:
We serve fresh ideas

A website from Shaishav Karnani to demonstrate the Umbraco content management system and how we have customised it for smartphones. 
Read all about it
HomeTemplate.mobileBodyContent:
Welcome to fresh ideas

This website is a demonstration of the capabilities of one of our favourite web content management systems, Umbraco. The purpose of the demonstration is to show:

 - how easy it is to change a website without having to call a programmer;

 - how you can enable your website for smartphones (and tablets); and

 - how you can manage content in an offline 'app'.

To view the mobile version of this website, simply access the site from your Android, Apple (or other) device. Or click the link in the footer.
HomeTemplate.body:
Welcome to fresh ideas

This website is a demonstration of the capabilities of one of our favourite web content management systems, Umbraco. The purpose of the demonstration is to show:

 - how easy it is to change a website without having to call a programmer;

 - how you can enable your website for smartphones (and tablets); and

 - how you can manage content in an offline 'app'.

To view the mobile version of this website, simply access the site from your Android, Apple (or other) device. Or click the link in the footer.

StandardTemplate.body:
About

It's Easy

We love Umbraco as it is so user friendly - our clients usually pick it up fast and with zero training. One of the aims of this demonstration is to show you this. You'll be managing the content of this very website.

Managing mobile websites

If you view this page on a moblie device, you won't be reading this. You'll be reading an abridged version of this page.

People who access websites from smartphones benefit from a simplified version of the website. This is easily achievable.

We have taken this a step further by customising the Umbraco website content management system so that it can display different content on mobile devices - where appropriate.

Sometimes you want to display the same content and you can do that too without doubling up - simply leave out the mobile content.

Content Management of Offline 'Apps'

One of the primary reasons we are asked to build apps for our customers is because mobile websites may not be accessible due to restricted internet access while travelling. The obvious solution is to build an app that can be installed and viewed without an internet connection.

At the same time our customers would also like to be able to periodically update the content on these offline apps. That's where it becomes a little more tricky (=expensive).

We have devised a simple alternative solution that is the best of both worlds. This is actually a mobile website, but all pages are still viewable without an internet connection. The only provisos are that the website must be simple and that your users must access the website once before they go offline,

Try it

See how it works with step-by-step instructions on how to manage standard web content, mobile content and offline content.

NewsDetailsTemplate.details:
Lorem Ipsum is simply dummy text of the printing and typesetting industry. Lorem Ipsum has been the industry's standard dummy text ever since the 1500s, when an unknown printer took a galley of type and scrambled it to make a type specimen book.

It has survived not only five centuries, but also the leap into electronic typesetting, remaining essentially unchanged.

It was popularised in the 1960s with the release of Letraset sheets containing Lorem Ipsum passages, and more recently with desktop publishing software like Aldus PageMaker including versions of Lorem Ipsum

Contrary to popular belief, Lorem Ipsum is not simply random text. It has roots in a piece of classical Latin literature from 45 BC, making it over 2000 years old.

Richard McClintock, a Latin professor at Hampden-Sydney College in Virginia, looked up one of the more obscure Latin words, consectetur, from a Lorem Ipsum passage, and going through the cites of the word in classical literature, discovered the undoubtable source.

ContactUSTemplate.contactFooterText: We will NOT pass on your e-mail address to other parties and we will NOT contact you unless your message requires a response.
